item.description: Stonehedge Cellars is pleased to announce its monthly Top 25 wines selected from around the world and available for sale. Join us for our monthly wine tasting events where we will unveil our new 'Top 25' list for you to taste. $20 per person charge will be applied to the purchase of one case of wine. All wine tastings are from 6:30pm - 8:30pm, on a flow basis. Join us when you can! Light hors d'oeuvres will be served. There will be a $20.00 charge for all tastings. However, we will be pleased to apply this amount to your purchase of at least one case of wine on the evening of the event.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Stonehedge Inn Wine Tasting
